pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-6245: Can now specify custom Spark schema when reading rows
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Did some test refactoring too to avoid some duplication.
Reorganized initializeRead.sjs into commented functions to make it easier to read.
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

commit.message:
DHFPROD-6245: Can now specify custom Spark schema when reading rows

Did some test refactoring too to avoid some duplication.

Reorganized initializeRead.sjs into commented functions to make it easier to read.

nodes.bodyText: Should we remove the word "schema" from here since we changed it to "sparkschema"?
